blank side: 1 space forward (rider leads his horse on foot, 6x)
Schritt: 2 spaces forward (pace, 2x)
Trab: 3 spaces forward (trot, 2x)
Galopp: 4 spaces forward (2x)
Carrieré: 5 spaces forward (1x)
Verirrt: 1 space backward (lost, 1x)
Gestürzt: stay (fallen, 1x)
Rast: stay and pass a turn (rest, 2x)
Lahm: drop out of the game or start again at space 1 (lame, 1x)

The game is probably from the 1890s.

202327.name: The Game of Rough Riders
202327.description:
This 1890 game by Edgar O. Clark is part of the publisher's Tokalon series and should not be confused with the 1900 Parker Brothers game The Rough Riders, which cashed in on Teddy Roosevelt's famous charge up San Juan Hill. Edgar O. Clark describes its game in the rules as simply "illustrating the wild life in the far West".

It is a simple spin and move game, with a few special spaces (Charge, Run Away, Ditch, Halt, Thrown and Wire Fence) that provide pluses or minuses. A piece that lands on another swaps places (sending the other back), and the four corner circles are safety points where bumping is not allowed. First player back to the start wins.

202328.name: The Hobbit Hole (Issue 8 - Nov 2008)
202328.description:
Contents:

From The Cave Mouth: Editorial by Mike Hill

Table of Contents

Soup Du Jour by Brian Clifton

Beneath the Temple of the Storm God by Andy R. Holmes

Peryton Ad

There's A Dirk in My Quiver by Mike Hill

Incident at Outpost 7 by Brian Clifton

Skills for Tunnels & Trolls by Mike Hill

Best of Trollwalla Limericks by Jason C. Mills, Naharaht, Gruggnukk and Boozer

Agony Ent by Jason C. Mills

A Trip To Pharmacy by Brian Penn

Mythical Remedies, Elixirs and Magical Mixtures by Brian Penn

Cymehk the Alchemist by Brian Penn

Alternate Specialist Classes by Aaron W. Thorne

For What It's Worth by Gimor Ironfang

Specialist Martial Artist by Paul Saunders

Dicing With Life by Mike Hill

Incoming (Rapid Fire) by Michael K. Edison

A Different Head for T&T - #3

Outlaw Press Sales Ad

202329.description:
User summary
古代建築「賢者の塔」 (ACTOP : Ancient Construct Tower of Philosopher) is a three-dimensional stacking game where players build chimney-shaped towers out of polycubes placed onto a board. One round is composed of the two actions of placing a polycube and a balance stone. The cubes of the positioned polycubes dictate the points awarded.

If a player's tower topples over, he or she loses the game. The game ends when a player's tower topples over or if all the available polycubes have been placed. At the end of the game, the player with the highest score wins.

This game is a development of the designer's earlier game Ancient Construct. Since the raw materials were no longer available to make Ancient Construct, the designer revised the game, introducing a strategic element and expanding play to 6 players.

Publisher's summary
ポリキューブを煙突状に塔を建てるようにボード上に配置していく立体積み上げゲームです。1手番はポリキューブとバランス石を置く2つのアクションで構成されます。配置したポリキューブのキューブ数が得点となります。
途中で塔を倒したプレーヤーは負けとなります。塔を倒した時と全てのポリキューブが配置された時点でゲームオーバーとなります。ゲームオーバー時点で一番得点の高いプレーヤーが勝ちとなります。
202329.name: ACTOP: Ancient Construct Tower of Philosopher

202330.name: Rundown Pub
202330.description:
From publisher blurb:

This full color battlemap is the 307th of a series featuring various terrains. This installment of the battlemap series features a small, rundown pub and gambling den.

The map is 14 x 10 squares in size, with each 1 inch square scaled to represent 5 feet. It is provided in 2 segments, which need to be assembled, in a single PDF using the letter format.

The product has been updated to include a large gridless JPG image of the map, intended for use with VTT software. It is 2016x1440 pixels in size at 144dpi.

202331.name: Pinnacle & Pit
202331.description:
From publisher blurb:

Since the release of the first bestiary, the first monster book, there have been those who asked - can I play something exotic, can I play a monster instead of a regular character?

In this release of the Monster Classes series, you have the opportunity to play as one of two outsider races - the angellic hound archon or the demonic succubus! As a member of these races, your experience playing in the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game is sure to be unique and filled with unexpected situations.

This book includes two monster classes - the hound archon and the succubus, along with the associated feats necessary to build interesting characters, that at the same time are true to the concept presented in the Bestiary.

202332.name: Shattered Vista
202332.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is a 40 x 40 inch, Battlemap of Shattered Vista , it has Hex, Square and No Overlays, it also includes the VTT files for online play.

“Those that lived above lost this place long ago. But now they have returned to take it back. They won’t regain this place without a fight. “—Voleman Leader

Shattered Vista is a single level exterior map of a mostly intact mansion covered with overgrowth in the north. A crack in the earth bisects the map and has since filled with water. The courtyard has a building that was leveled by the quake.

Shattered Vista is intended for use in a post-post-apocalyptic game (one where a disaster has occurred and the land has started to recover). It can also be used in modern games as the location of a past earthquake or even a lost world type of scenario beneath the surface of the world.

Adventure hook for use with this map:

Temple of the Volemen: The volemen prayed to their Earth God for a new temple. The god answered as a massive earthquake swallowed up a building from the world above and sent it underground. In reverence to their god, the volemen put phosphorescent moss in the chamber and diverted an underground river to go through the crack in the earth in the middle of the temple square. Soon plant life flourished and grew over the stone courtyard, the flattened building, and the still standing Volemen Temple to their Earth God.

The player characters are mutant or human survivors from the world above. A sudden quake or sinkhole sucks them below the surface. The volemen rush to the temple to defend it against the invaders. A twist on this could be the player characters are the volemen instead when their home is suddenly invaded by mutants or men.

202333.name: Villains Unleashed
202333.description:
From publisher blurb:

Villains Unleashed is both a sourcebook and an adventure book for V&V. The initial pages present two complete themed villain groups (with 12 Characters) and 14 independent villains. The second part of the book is the introductory encounters that lead in to a multi-book adventure campaign. What is the international syndicate known as Triskelion? What are their goals? And how do the seemingly unrelated crimes in the adventure “The Triskelion Gambit” relate to those goals? Read on and discover villains for use in any campaign and the beginning of a complete campaign for any gaming group.

202335.name: Lis: Gra Karciana
202335.description:
Lis: Gra Karciana is a card game created based on the comic book "Lis" published by Wydawnictwo Sol Invictus. Its action takes place in the today Poland and derive from such genres as criminal, thriller or superhero.

The are 66 cards in the deck, which will cause the gameplay to be full of twists and turns. On each of them there are illustrations kept in the style of the comic book "Lis". In the "Lis: Gra Karciana" players will be able to play as one of four comic book characters, which must collect the appropriate goals.

There are different type of cards: character, goal and action cards. Each player receives 1 character card face down, 1 goal card and 3 action cards. All remaining cards are mixed together and shuffled. In your turn you can do 2 moves from the following ones: draw a card, play an action card, discard 2 cards from your hand to draw 1 card from the discard pile. The card hand limit is 7 cards.

At any moment if another player is playing an action card, you can block its effect by saying "stop" and discarding one goal card from your hand. Other players can block your "stop" by doing the same.

You win immediately if at any point you manage to collect 4 out of 5 goal cards matching (giving 3 points) your character. If nobody was able to collect 4 dedicated goal cards, the game ends after the turn of the player which drew the last card from the deck. In this case the players will sum the points gained from the goal cards based on the scoring from their character cards. The player with the biggest score wins.

202336.name: Boyne Class Replenishment Ship
202336.description:
From publisher blurb:

Gypsy Knights Games is proud to present the fourteenth entry in our line of products dedicated to the starships of Clement Sector.

A successful support vessel with a long service history, the Boyne-class was designed for use by the Royal Navy but was a very successful export even before the ship entered service, eventually serving in national navies, system navies, and defense forces across Clement Sector.

“I think we have an important role, someone has to keep providing stuff to throw at the bad guys.” - Leutnant Hannah Schmidt, Senior supply officer, HFS James Joyce, Wellington c2339 CE

As part of the United Kingdom’s Ministry of Defence’s hull procurement program for the planned expansion of the Royal Navy a new class of mid-size replenishment ships were put into service in 2282. A total of twenty of the new Boyne-class replenishment ships were authorized for construction. The lead ship, HMS Boyne had only just been commenced when orders began to be sought from the United States, India, Australia, Russia and France who were all looking at newer, larger replenishment vessels to replace those currently in service.

Ships of Clement Sector 14: Boyne-class Replenishment Ship comes complete with beautiful views of the ship. The Boyne is presented with full deckplans and statistics to make your use of our product simple, easy and fun. In addition, the ship comes with a set of adventure hooks to get your characters right into the action as well as a short story written by Bradley Warnes.

This volume also includes the Aranui-class Medium Cargo Vessel. The Aranui is a civilian variant of the Boyne which was licensed originally to Anderson and Felix to provide full maintenance and refit. As they had a full set of design plans it was decided to produce a civilian version of the Boyne squarely aimed at small merchant shipping companies and wealthier owner/captains.

Though designed specifically with our Clement Sector setting in mind, these ships could easily be used in any science fiction setting.

202337.name: Wise Men
202337.description:
From the introduction:

The following is a fanciful vision of the adventures the wise men could have experienced as they traveled from the Far East to Bethlehem. A few liberties have been taken with the text to make the adventure playable and exciting. Each member of a small group of players can represent a wise man since no definitive number is given in scripture, though there were probably at least three (one for each gift). The Once Born Non-Player Character rules are used for the wise man characters since the wise men are essentially Old Testament personalities.

202339.name: Rhune: Dawn of Twilight Savage Primer
202339.description:
From publisher blurb:

Are You Ready for Ragnarök?

Welcome to Rhune!

The activation of the Clockwork Gates started the countdown, and the final battles loom on the horizon. Servants of the Thrall Lords mass to destroy the civilzed southern lands. The races are divided over preparing for war or trying to prevent it from starting.

The world sits on a precipice and needs Heroes to survive.

This primer includes everything needed to begin your adventures in Rhune:

A history told by renowned historian Lady Mikal of Westholme
Information about Stormpunk technology, magic, and religions
A full complement of Stormpunk and gunpowder weapons
Hero creation rules
Six player character races

202340.name: Valley of Power, Spirit of Might
202340.description:
From the introduction:

Descending the Cliffs of Compassion into the Valley of Power, I am made aware of my own weakness and need of the Spirit-of-Might, whom I will meet in the river basin below. The jagged rock walls of the mountains loom over me. I feel small and insignificant. Soon I must join a raid team that will enter the dangerous Dragon Lands, risking my life for the great OverLord of Many Names.

202341.name: The Sorcerer's Apprentice Rescue
202341.description:
From the introduction:

The team runs into a drunken man as they walk down the streets of Safety's End. "We gots two!", he says, referring to the two children born this night in this town who will be dedicated to the School of Magic. While the group is talking about this horrible news, a horse approaches and nuzzles one of them.

"I am ready to take you to where the OverLord of Many Names calls you," states the horse. "The OverLord of Many Names knows the desire in your hearts to rescue those helpless babies from the School of Witchcraft. Are you willing to risk your lives to perform this rescue?"

202342.name: The Lonely Meadows Raid
202342.description:
From the introduction:

We are driving down a narrow country road, all of us, on a bright, sunny day. The area around us is flat, and fields line both sides of the road. A small but thick cluster of trees lay straight ahead, and the road takes us right into those trees. It is then that a marvelous change happens.

The trees become thicker and thicker, and all at once we are in a dense forest. Then the car disappears from around us, and we are each marching on a narrow path. We carry shields and medieval weapons. Traveling with us is a lion and a wolf. We are surprised but not shaken. Somehow we know that we are on a dragon raid for Jesus Christ. But instead of being on Earth, we are on the planet of EdenAgain where He is called the OverLord of many names. And the lion and the wolf talk!

202343.name: Lightraider Challenge Part 2: The Tomb of Heroes
202343.description:
From the introduction:

Your small band of faithful adventurers has spent most of the day traveling due east, heading deeper into the heart of the Highland Forest after leaving the Heinous Heights region behind. The march into Highland Forrest began early this morning at the hollow tree, where you said goodbye to Natha and Aban and followed the SaltWarrior Daren deeper into the forest. Before leaving the hollow tree Daren re-supplied each LightRaider with another day’s worth of rations.

It is now getting dark. The group begins to grow hungry and tired. You start to search for a nice spot to set up camp for the night. After finding a high spot well off the path, you turn aside and begin the preparations. Before long the camp is ready.

202344.name: Lightraider Challenge Part 1: The Caste of the Falls
202344.description:
From the introduction:

You have recently graduated from the LightRaider Academy and have left the town of Dayspring Highlands for a short trip. While on vacation you and your Academy friends are playing at the seashore. You have worked hard to earn graduation and are really enjoying the prospect of some carefree time on the sand and surf. But you are also eager for adventure and wonder if any can be found on these safe shores. You consider some of the possible exploits that await you far away when you are guided to step into one of the Passage Lakes and enter the Dragon Lands through a Hollow Tree.

202346.name: Planet Maldoran
202346.description:
From publisher blurb:

Planet Maldoran is a science fantasy setting full of dangerous places and dangerous monsters, all oriented around plots and situations, so it's system agnostic.

202347.name: The Death Cult
202347.description:
From Introduction:

As far as nameless, death-worshipping cults go, the one that battles for control of Skull Mountain is certainly not the most nihilistic organization to ever blemish the face of the Earth, but that is the secret to their success. They have a clear agenda, and while it is obsessively violent and ultimately calls for the extinction of all sentient life, it excludes self-destruction. This cult may serve the gods of death, but they intend to be the last among the living, and the last to cross that threshold once and for all.

202348.name: The Death Cult
202348.description:
From Introduction:

As far as nameless, death-worshipping cults go, the one that battles for control of Skull Mountain is certainly not the most nihilistic organization to ever blemish the face of the Earth, but that is the secret to their success. They have a clear agenda, and while it is obsessively violent and ultimately calls for the extinction of all sentient life, it excludes self-destruction. This cult may serve the gods of death, but they intend to be the last among the living, and the last to cross that threshold once and for all.

202349.name: The Amalgam
202349.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Monthly Monster for May is The Amalgam, a creature that tears holes in reality to connect different planes of existence. This is one of those monsters that feels like it could be the start of a whole new theme, so maybe we will end up doing more Planescape-style fantasy monsters.

Both Dungeon World and Labyrinth Lord stats are provided in the same document this time.

202352.description:
Brothers! Salvation is at hand! King Rat is holed up at the top of the grandfather clock. If we can negotiate our way safely through the clock and plant 4 sticks of dynamite directly beneath his lair we can end his evil reign once and for all. Move swiftly but softly, mice. Our future is in your hands...'

Dynamice is a free to download print and play game. It is a nine card nanogame of guiding dynamite-carrying mice through the insides of a grandfather clock. Can you guide all 4 mice to their target before any of them hit an obstacle and explode?

Awards

Entered into the 2016 9-card nanogame contest
1st Place: Most Innovative Mechanic
2nd Place: Best New Designer
3rd Place: Best Overall Game
202352.name: Dynamice

202374.name: Carps & Angsty Manatee: Volume 2
boardgameintegration: Cards Against Humanity
Cards Against Humanity
202374.description:
A third-party, unofficial parody expansion pack for Cards Against Humanity.

Includes 150 brand new, original cards (125 ridiculous white cards & 25 preposterous black cards).

202375.name: Race
202375.description:
Four Knonsters compete in a race in order to find out who is the fastest Knonster. Is it the anxious Rithle, the snappy Aristas, the self-confident Celya or the devious Elaari? Choose your two Favorites and help them to get a good rank in the race.

Gameplay:
The starting player is chosen randomly. Then, starting with the starting player, each player in clockwise order plays one of his cards and executes the instructions of the card. In most cases this means, that a certain Knonster will be moved forward a few steps. But there are cases where the card does not have an effect in the current game situation; in that case, no Knonster is moved. If a Knonster crosses the finish line after position 60, it will be placed on the best still available place on the podium. If a player has fewer than 5 hand cards, the player draws a card from the draw pile (if there are any cards left).

End of Game:
The game ends immediately after the third Knonster has crossed the finish line. Theoretically it can also happen, that the draw deck is depleted when a player is about to draw a card, but fewer than 3 Knonsters have reached the goal. In that case, the game also ends, but only for the Knonsters which have reached the goal the points will be distributed.

202376.name: Exposed Character Pack: Tools of the Trade
202376.description: This is a pack of twelve alternate Character cards that were given away to backers of the Exposed Kickstarter campaign. They are labeled Item #37 through Item #48.

202377.name: Mario Party Star Rush
videogamehonor: 2016 Gamescom Best Mobile/Handheld Game of the Year Winner
202377.description:
A NEW APPROACH TO MARIO PARTY: QUICKER PLAY AND SIMULTANEOUS TURNS!

Team up with Mario, Peach, Donkey Kong, and more in the most perfectly portable Mario Party game to date. Play with up to four players simultaneously, exploring different worlds as you freely move your Toad across maps and recruit Mushroom Kingdom allies. Break free of turn order, with all players plotting strategy, rolling the dice, and moving... all simultaneously! Team up with your friends in the real world to compete or cooperate to take down bosses in each game board.

Features:

Recruit characters like Toadette, Rosalina, and Wario to team up with and support you in Toad Scramble starring Toads.
Choose from multiple boards in different worlds, each with tricky boss battles.
Up to four players can simultaneously roll and move freely around a map.
Team up with up to four Mushroom Kingdom characters who can help you win by participating in different events.
Fully refined for bite-sized portable play, perfect for the Nintendo 3DS family of systems.
Multiplayer via Local Wireless (additional games and systems required; sold separately) or Download Play (additional systems required; sold separately). For the first time in series history, compatible with multi-card communication.
Packed with different modes that everyone can enjoy.

Source: The Game Website.

202378.name: Space Connection
202378.description:
Space Connection is a two-player deduction game. Each player has a two-part board, with one part being used to set up their "planets" and the other for the opponent's attempts to find them.

Each player has twenty plastic planet pegs which need to be placed in exactly nine groups of contiguous pegs (abstractly representing the Solar System's planets). Each player also has pegs representing lasers and reconnaissance ships of different strengths.

The ships can be placed to investigate one space, one space plus the six adjacent spaces, or all spaces in one of the triangles the board is divided into. A ship is only returned if its space actually contains a planet peg, otherwise it remains on the opponent's board and cannot be used again. The lasers are only useful when at least two have been placed in a line, as they reveal planets in all spaces between them.

The first player to find all twenty opposing pegs is the winner.

202380.name: Ultima Forsan: Dead in Venice
202380.description:
From the introduction:

The adventure begins in the sky over Old Venice, while the characters are flying to (or from) the Teutonic Federate Principalities. They are traveling on an astonishing aircraft built in Ferrara and their mission could be diplomatic, or linked to another adventure or campaign. I.e. the aircraft might be directed to Lucca for the upcoming Universal Council (see the official campaign Once upon a time in Lucca) or the reason of the travel is somehow connected with The secret of Marco Polo, the four-parts adventure you can find in Ultima Forsan: Setting Book. The sly Hilaire von Aschenbach and her Lazzarettos are an encounter in common for both adventures and you can manage their mood and reaction according to previous encounters.

Suddenly a cannon hits the flying ship.

202389.name: In the Towers of the Sun, the Depths of Shadow, We Dance
rpg: In the Towers of the Sun, the Depths of Shadow, We Dance
202389.description:
From the introduction:

In the Towers of the Sun, the Depths of Shadow, We Dance is a game set in a solarpunk future gone not-right; the solar-power-collecting-and-using nanotech that could have set the whole world free has instead made a greater division than ever between those with power (literally) and those without. Those who live in the high towers, whose hyper-efficient collectors and reflectors feed the nanotech batteries, can power all the machines that make their lives convenient with their own bodies.

Below them, in the shadows, live the Underdwellers, who cannot access nearly as much power by themselves; instead, they must spend their lives controlling what little power they get to its greatest effectiveness, and share power when there is something they need that is greater than what one of them can provide.

202390.name: Ever Oasis
202390.description:
From the team behind The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D comes a daring new adventure that expands on everything RPG fans love about the genre. As a chosen Seedling, your mission is to build a prosperous oasis by working with your partner, lsuna. Meet and ally with members of other tribes to complete your mission, while battling against the Chaos threatening peace in the desert. Battle enemies in real-time combat as you switch between three party members and explore a savage desert. Forage for materials in caves and puzzle-filled dungeons to earn dewadems, which are used to grow new shops and even grow gear!

Features:

Dive into a new take on the Adventure RPG genre in a brand new IP.
Explore a savage desert, deep caves, and puzzle-filled dungeons.
Forage materials to make products at shops, or synthesize equipment and items at your treehouse.
Complete missions to recruit new villagers, each with their own shops, weapons and abilities, then bring them exploring/foraging.
Earn dewadem, currency, over time as shops sell their wares to build new Bloom Booths.
Developed by GREZZO Co., Ltd. the team behind The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D
Battle wildlife that are possessed by Chaos and other enemies in real-time combat, while actively switching between party members.
Immerse into a beautifully created world inspired by Egyptian culture/mythology.

Source: The Game Website.

202394.description:
From the publisher:

“The test is simple: if he does not burn, he is a witch. If he does burn, then he was an innocent.”
–Matthias Krieger

Witch Hunters will travel far and wide to hunt down and destroy the forces of evil. Their pursuit is utterly relentless, and they will do whatever they must in order to eliminate the evils they encounter—even if that means they suffer a few innocent casualties.

The Witch Hunter Expansion Pack allows you to enjoy your Old World dungeon adventures as one of these grim and resolved holy warriors. You'll find everything you need to add the Witch Hunter to your games of Warhammer Quest: The Adventure Card Game, including three hero cards, eight actions, and three items. Taken as a whole, these emphasize the Witch Hunter's unfaltering dedication to her mission and lead toward a unique play style built around her unwavering pursuit of evil.
202394.name: Warhammer Quest: The Adventure Card Game – Witch Hunter Expansion Pack

202395.description:
From the publisher:
“Let my orange crest stand testament to my shame. Let all foes behold it and know fear, for I have none remaining.”
–Kurgi Balginson

The savage Dwarf fighters known as Troll Hunters seek glorious death in battle to make up for some great shame in their past. As a result, they routinely seek combat with the most dangerous monsters they can find.

There's nothing subtle about the Troll Slayer Expansion Pack for Warhammer Quest: The Adventure Card Game. It's just a giant heap of fearless, axe-wielding, battlecry-screaming, death-dealing Dwarf. The Troll Slayer's three hero cards, eight actions, and three legendary gear cards are all aimed squarely at leaping into the thick of combat, unarmored, and cutting down your foes.
202395.name: Warhammer Quest: The Adventure Card Game – Trollslayer Expansion Pack

202396.name: Pokemon XY Mega Evolution
202396.description: Pokemon XY Mega Evolution is a board game from Takara Tomy. The players uses a spinner that gives players move points. A player then move his/her a creature on the board and read the text on the spot they land on, or move a hero to get upgrades. There are also different paths to take. First hero to the goal is the winner.

202398.name: HELLO TAIWAN
202398.description:
HELLO TAIWAN is a card game about KUSO(funny) Taiwan's native affairs. There are so many dumbfounding things, complex issues of history and ethnic groups in Taiwan.
We carefully designed for each character's appearance , skills and features in the game to transform serious social events into funny cardset ability.
Let's play the game with smile and enjoy it !

[Component]
Game BoardX1
CardsX200 (include Minions and Spells)

[How to play]
1. Shuffle the cards and deal 30 cards to each players as their own deck.
2. Decide which player will go first randomly.
3. Each player draw 4 random cards from their own deck.
4. Each players have their turns alternately. At the start of each playes's turn one card is drawn from their deck and added to their hand. At the first turn of each players, they have 1 Skill Point (SP) ,then at the second turn of each players, they have 2 Skill Point (SP) ,and so on.
5.During your turn, you may play any of your cards, including summoning minions, casting spells. Playing a card will consume the amount of SP stated in the top-left corner of the card. You are also able to command your minions to attack opponent's minions or player.

[Minions]
Minions remain on the board after entering play and only leave when destroyed. Minions may not attack on the turn they enter play, but may attack each turn afterward.

[Spells]
Spells are cards which change the state of play, dealing damage, healing wounds, or buffing Minions.

[Winning the game]
A player wins the game when he reduces opponent's player to zero life.

哈囉臺灣是一款本土的KUSO時事卡牌遊戲。 臺灣有太多讓人哭笑不得的事情，有太多歷史與族群等複雜的問題，在遊戲中，我們針對每­一位角色精心設計外型、技能及特性，讓嚴肅社會事件，轉化成有趣的牌組功能，就讓我們­滿懷笑容的參與，並且享受其中吧。

202399.name: En5ider (Issue 82 - Jun 2016)
202399.description:
From publisher blurb:

A brand new adventure from Mike Myler for 5th level characters. Can the party help find out who framed Kanral Bodache, save a missing prince, defeat an evil diabolist, and save the walled city of Rettikus? Also includes statistics for a new monster, the Relic Golem!

202400.name: Player's Advantage: Monk
202400.description:
From publisher blurb:

Samurai Sheepdog is proud to present the previously unreleased, highly anticipated followup to the Player's Advantage line that started with Rogues. After 14 years, you can finally pick up a copy of Player's Advantage - Monk!

Want to add a new twist to your monk? This product spends 130 pages providing different variations, class builds, and prestige class ideas for monks that are still fun to use as inspiration for any d20 monk character.
Want to fill out your collection of Mystic Eye options? Look no further. Player's Advantage - Monk is only one of many books now available in PDF; unchanged from its final editing pass in 2003 and laid out with a retro feel while applying the Samurai Sheepdog logos and website.
Want to see one of these great books updated for Pathfinder or 5th Edition D&D? Let us know and we'll put our attention on the most popular first.




About the Book

Delve into your favorite classes with new rules, variant classes, prestige classes, and other exciting additions. For the new player, you'll find helpful information to develop your character from both a rules and role-playing standpoint. Experienced players will discover ample new options to breathe new life into old classes. Game Masters, do not despair, there are helpful chapters for you as well! Easily choose class combinations to create unique NPCs using detailed charts for multiclassed characters. New NPC classes and sample NPCs makes it easy to add new flavor to your game. The series also builds on proven Open Game Content, taking it to new heights by integrating it into the new material. Don't be satisfied with just any expansion book, take the advantage!

The series continues with Player's Advantage: Monk - jump kicking its way onto the scene!

5 Archetypes detailing numerous types of monks, their practices, outlook, recommended feats, races, and variations give old and new players a fresh look at the rogue.
Numerous feats expand the monk's capabilities, taking him in new directions and new heights.
6 New PC classes, 1 NPC class, and 12 prestige classes provide plentiful alternatives to the core monk.
10 Killer combos let you, at a glance, compare multiclassing options to choose the right character for the job. Useful for planning PCs or creating NPCs, these charts include character concepts and related archetypes to aid in choosing feats, skills, and other game mechanics.
New equipment makes the dirty work easier and more exciting with new monk weapons so you don't have to feel left out when everybody else is buying gear.
And tons more! Uncover the secrets of the monk and see the class with new eyes.

202401.name: The Great Game (M&M3)
202401.description:
From publisher blurb:


A mad god searches for a dark ritual that will give him the means to destroy the universe.
A corrupt space-police organization enslaves civilized worlds to enrich itself.
An empire of sentient machines is exterminating any biological life in its path.
Pirates prey upon the space-ways with impunity.


Meanwhile, the forces of order and good are retreating, scattered and embattled.

The universe needs heroes!

Written by a stellar cast of RPG talent (including RPG legend Steve Perrin, Jason Tondro (aka Doctor Comics)and Jacob Blackmon) with many a fond tip of the Kirby Crackling Hat to the cosmic supers of yore, The Great Game is a setting that puts your PCs in the center of the fun.

The Great Game provides characters, organizations, starship stats, adventure hooks and advice for running a space-based supers campaign.

NOTE: This system contains several references to the Stark City RPG setting. However, it is not necessary to be familar with Stark City to use this book.

202402.name: Dungeon Questing Fantasy Roleplaying Game
202402.description:
From publisher blurb:

Dungeon Questing is a classic fantasy roleplaying game based on Swords & Wizardry White Box but with a completely changed rules mechanic — this game only uses six-sided dice to handle anything in the game, and there is no levels or classes.

Players create their characters in the way they see fit and character advancement is skill based, where the advancement comes in small steps after each gaming session.

For those of you who still wants classes and levels, fear not! The classes and levels are still there as an optional rule for character creation and advancement, which is basically the original White Box using a 2d6 system instead.

So grab you sword and shield and start your adventures in the world of Dungeon Questing!

Features:

Only six-sided dice are used; a 2d6 mechanic for action checks.
Custom character creation using a skill-based system.
All the White Box spells and monsters (plus a few additional ones!).
Rules for strongholds and mass battles.
A new treasure generation system.
Classes and levels as an optional system for characters.

202403.name: Expanding Worlds: New Races Volume 1
202403.description:
From publisher blurb:

This product is designed to be used with Mikael Hassel's Dungeon Questing

Expanding Worlds New Races Volume One contains six races for use with Dungeon Questing and other OSR/White-Box based games. This product includes...

Gnomes
Half-Elves
Half-Orcs
Panthera
Pixies
Satyr




Each race has information about its height, weight and their starting ages. Each write-up is fully detailed and are ready to be used right away!

202404.name: Expanding Worlds: New Races Volume 2
202404.description:
From publisher blurb:

This product is designed to be used with Mikael Hassel's Dungeon Questing

Expanding Worlds New Races Volume One contains six races for use with Dungeon Questing and other OSR/White-Box based games. This product includes...

Avian
Centaur
Golem
Minotaur
Raptor
Ratling




Each race has information about its height, weight and their starting ages. Each write-up is fully detailed and are ready to be used right away!

202405.name: Comic Book Vigilante Archetypes
202405.description:
From publisher blurb:

Be the Hero Your Game Deserves!

The vigilante from Pathfinder Roleplaying Game: Ultimate Intrigue offers you the chance to play the sort of hero usually found only in comic books, and, in fact, many of the archetypes for the vigilante seem to be direct references to famous heroes from comic books. But while the existing options allow you to access a wide variety of power sets of existing super heroes, there are some major gaps in the vigilante’s offerings.

This book presents three new archetypes for vigilantes, each patterned off of one or more famous comic book superheroes. Astound friends and foes alike with masterful feats of archery and access to a wide variety of special trick arrows as an arrow of justice, including arrows that release sleeping gas, arrows that explode with fire, and arrows that release entangling goo! Run circles around your foes as a blitz, a high-speed archetype that lets you move faster than the eye can see, dash across the battlefield in the middle of a full-attack action, and push allies out of harm’s way as an immediate action. Finally, prove that justice is blind as a devil’s eye, gaining the ability to turn off your sight and hearing in order to gain incredible superhuman senses.

202406.name: Beasts of the East (5E)
202406.description:
From publisher blurb:

Unleashed in the East!

Beasts of the East reaches into the mythological and folkloric wellsprings across Asia to bring you an octet of amazing opponents. Whether your heroes are traveling on an epic transcontinental journey into Eastern lands or running a campaign already set in fantastic realms inspired by the Orient, Beasts of the East draws deeply upon the Asian legendarium to bring you creatures not just from the familiar stories of China and Japan, but ranges more broadly into the lore of Cambodia, Vietnam, and Tibet to bring you fantastic foes for your campaign. These creatively constructed creatures comprise a delightfully novel resource for GMs looking to expand their monster toolkit, especially if they explore Asian adventuring or just add a bit of Asian spice to a traditional Western campaign.

202407.name: Windmill of Tregg
202407.description:
From publisher blurb:

Filbar Friday continues in the Dual Series with FD9 – Windmill of Tregg! You’ve arrived at the small community of Smentz (15 locations!) to regain strength after your last adventure. While speaking with the people of the small village you catch wind of some ruins across the river that may have a mine or cache of ore and ruins to investigate. Your group is not the first who has had interest in searching but those that have ventured east have not returned. Are you ready for a bit more adventure?

This adventure setting was designed for 1st/2nd Edition AD&D for the Filbar Dual Campaign for a 2-4 mid-level adventurers and DM. Primarily designed for two players, the FD series has included the opportunity for NPC assistance or with just four players. This adventure is easily adaptable to most any game and system. Save yourself some time and utilize it for a one shot adventure or a continuing campaign!

boardgamehonor: 2016 Golden Geek Best Thematic Board Game Nominee
2016 Golden Geek Most Innovative Board Game Nominee
202408.description:
In the future, war has left the world in complete destruction and split the people into factions. The factions have decided to stop the endless war and settle their dispute in the arena. A new virtual bloodsport was created. The Adrenaline tournament. Every faction has a champion, every champion has a chance to fight and the chance to win. Will you take the chance of becoming the next champion of the Adrenaline tournament?

Play a first-person shooter on your gaming table. Grab some ammo, grab a gun, and start shooting. Build up an arsenal for a killer turn. Combat resolution is quick and diceless. And if you get shot, you get faster!
202408.name: Adrenaline
boardgamepodcastepisode: Cult of the New Board Game Podcast Episode 029 – Why Jam Improves Your Game
